desc: Completed a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Information Technology at Sankalchand Patel University with an overall CGPA of 8.14. Gained strong foundational knowledge in Data Structures, Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Database Management Systems, Operating Systems, and Computer Networks.
degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Information Technology

desc: Completed a Diploma in Computer Engineering from Gujarat Technological University (GTU) with a CGPA of 7.59. Focused on core subjects such as Programming, Digital Logic Design, Computer Architecture, and Web Development.
